name: WebiNerds
tagline: Dev shop. We are Nerds who mean business.
description:
The WebiNerds team is crazy about two things: technology and business. We’ve been working with US and European clients since 2012, and have proven a reliable partner for tech startups. Recently, we’ve been working with Techstars companies to improve their products. Since April 2017 we are an official partner of 500 Startups accelerator.
 Modern technologies have the potential to improve people’s lives in tangible ways; we’re delighted to be able to work on promising projects in the areas of FinTech, Healthcare, Data Science and Machine Learning.
Our services include:
1) Project planning
2) User interface and user experience design
3) Web, iOS and Android app development
4) Quality assurance
5) Project management
6) API design and development
7) Admin panel development
8) App release support
9) Continuous product enhancement
